summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 CHEVROLET SILVERADO 1500. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V383000 (AIR BAGS) HOWEVER, THE PARTS TO DO THE REPAIR WERE UNAVAILABLE. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO WATSON CHEVROLET LOCATED AT 625 W AUTO MALL DR, TUCSON, AZ 85705, WHERE THE CONTACT WAS ADVISED THAT HE WOULD BE CONTACTED ONCE THE PARTS WERE AVAILABLE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. THE VIN WAS NOT AVAILABLE.  UPDATED 09/01/17*LJ   UPDATED 09/06/2017 *JS
